content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) that moves products to output chest
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 801 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System at position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water from pump to boiler at positions(-9.5,23.5),(-8.5,23.5),(-8.5,22.5),(-7.5,22.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) 
- Steam pipe network at positions(-5.5,24.5),(-5.5,25.5),(-5.5,26.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electricity pole network connecting various machines

### Science Pack Processing at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Lab at position(0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) moving science packs from chest to lab
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing 865 automation science packs and 347 logistic science packs

### Smelting Area
Consists of three furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) 
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces currently idle with no ingredients

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Prerequisites
- Ensure all prerequisite technologies are researched before attempting to research advanced technologies:
  - Plastics needed for Advanced Electronics
  - Lubricant needed for Electric Engine
  - Optics needed for Solar Energy
  - Heavy Armor needed for Modular Armor
  - Chemical Science Pack needed for Electric Energy Distribution 2
  - Production Science Pack needed for Logistics 3

### Already Researched Technologies
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research:
  - Military Science
  - Electronics
  - Electric Energy Distribution 1
  - Fast Inserter
  - Logistics 2

### Non-existent Technologies
- Verify technology names exist in the game:
  - "Grenades"
  - "Character Inventory Slots"
  - "Research Speed"

### Resource Management
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into boilers
- Monitor coal levels in power system to maintain continuous operation
